original_text:
Fruits´n Royals
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 10
Puntata min.: 0,40 €
Puntata max.: 20 €
Autoplay: No
Tema e simboli
Fruits’n Royals ad una prima occhiata, può apparire come la classica slot a tema frutta, molto lineare e senza particolari funzionalità o effetti.
In realtà, sebbene strizzi un occhio alle tradizionali slot machine terrestri e sia presente anche in versione VLT, ha una grafica molto curata e l’aggiunta di altri simboli, oltre ai frutti.
I simboli caratteristici sono la prugna, il mandarino, il limone e le ciliegie, più il re e la regina.
Non è presente un simbolo Scatter, ma c’è il Wild, rappresentato da una stella, che funge da jolly e può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli nel completamento di una singola linea vincente.
Come si gioca?
Il funzionamento di questa slot machine è molto semplice, ma presenta tuttavia delle funzionalità particolari che rendono il gioco più coinvolgente.
L’obiettivo del gioco è quello di allineare uno stesso simbolo, partendo da sinistra verso destra, per almeno tre volte. La vincita massima si ottiene quando compare la stessa figura su tutti i cinque rulli.
Oltre a questa modalità tradizionale, si può giocare anche con la funzionalità “Gamble”.
In cosa consiste?
Quando si ottiene una qualsiasi vincita appare in automatico il tasto “Rischio” con il quale si può accedere alla funzione speciale. Sulla schermata compare quindi una mano di carte e si può decidere di puntare tutta la vincita appena ottenuta sul colore della carta che verrà girata, rosso o nero. Le probabilità di vincita sono del 50:50: in caso di scommessa giusta, tutta la somma ottenuta verrà raddoppiata, mentre in caso contrario, quanto vinto verrà perso. Si tratta dunque di una funzionalità adatta a chi ama rischiare e mira a ottenere sempre di più!
Conclusioni
Fruits’n Royals è un ottimo compromesso tra una classica slot che richiama i vecchi giochi terrestri e le moderne video slot. La grafica infatti, fruttata e ricca di colori, gratifica i giocatori più nostalgici amanti delle slot machine “old school”, mentre la presenza di un simbolo Wild e la funzionalità “Gamble”, sono tipiche dei giochi più recenti.
Se quello che cercate dunque, è un’esperienza di gioco semplice e intuitiva, ma che al contempo offra versatilità e un buon numero di possibilità di vincita, Fruits’n Royals è la slot machine che fa per voi!
Slot simili
Fruits’n Royals fa parte della categoria delle cosiddette “Fruits machine”, ossia quelle slot che tra i loro simboli annoverano la frutta.
Si tratta di una categoria molto ampia, in cui si trovano per la maggior parte slot abbastanza tradizionali legate all’immagine delle vecchie slot terrestri.
Nonostante siano così tradizionali, non significa però che siano passate di moda e infatti l’offerta di questa tipologia di slot è ancora molto ampia.
Tra le tante troviamo, per esempio, Fruits of Ra, un connubio molto riuscito tra una tradizionale Fruits Machine e le slot legate ai temi storici, rifacendosi come simbologia all’Antico Egitto.
Ancora, abbiamo Retro Reels, in cui la modernità di una videoslot e la nostalgia per le sale gioco terrestri sono unite sapientemente.

raw_translation.response:
"Fruits'n Royals" Slot Review

General Features:
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €20
Autoplay: No

Theme and Symbols:
At first glance, "Fruits'n Royals" may seem like a typical fruit-themed slot with a linear gameplay and no special features or effects. However, it has a beautifully crafted graphics and additional symbols, apart from the fruits. The characteristic symbols are plum, mandarin, lemon and cherries, as well as the king and queen. There is no Scatter symbol, but there is a Wild symbol represented by a star, which acts as a joker and can replace all other symbols in completing a single winning line.

Gameplay:
The gameplay of this slot machine is very simple, yet it presents special features that make the game more engaging. The objective of the game is to align the same symbol, from left to right, at least three times. The maximum win is obtained when the same figure appears on all five reels. Apart from this traditional mode, you can also play with the "Gamble" functionality. 

What is it all about?
When you obtain any winnings, the "Risk" button automatically appears, which allows you to access the special feature. A hand of cards appears on the screen and you can decide to bet all the winnings you just obtained on the color of the card that will be turned over, red or black. The chances of winning are 50:50. In case of a correct bet, the entire amount obtained will be doubled, while in the other case, the winnings will be lost. Thus, this feature is suitable for those who love to take risks and aim to obtain even more!

Conclusion:
"Fruits'n Royals" is an excellent compromise between a classic slot that recalls old land games and modern video slots. The fruity and colorful graphics gratify nostalgic players who love "old-school" slot machines, while the presence of a Wild symbol and "Gamble" functionality are typical of newer games. If you are looking for a simple and intuitive gaming experience that offers versatility and a good number of winning possibilities, then "Fruits'n Royals" is the slot machine for you!

Similar slots:
"Fruits'n Royals" is part of the category of so-called "Fruits machines", which include fruit symbols among their symbols. This is a very broad category, where you can find mostly traditional slots linked to the image of old land-based games. Despite being so traditional, it does not mean that they are out of fashion, and in fact, the offer of this type of slot is still very wide. Among the many, we find, for example, "Fruits of Ra", a successful combination of a traditional fruit machine and slots linked to historical themes, referencing ancient Egypt as its symbolism. We also have "Retro Reels", where the modernity of a video slot and the nostalgia for land-based gaming rooms are smartly combined.

Review: "Fruits'n Royals" Slot Review

General Features:
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €20
Autoplay: No

Theme and Symbols:
At first glance, "Fruits'n Royals" may seem like a typical fruit-themed slot with a linear gameplay and no special features or effects. However, it has a beautifully crafted graphics and additional symbols, apart from the fruits. The characteristic symbols are plum, mandarin, lemon and cherries, as well as the king and queen. There is no Scatter symbol, but there is a Wild symbol represented by a star, which acts as a joker and can replace all other symbols in completing a single winning line.

Gameplay:
The gameplay of this slot machine is very simple, yet it presents special features that make the game more engaging. The objective of the game is to align the same symbol, from left to right, at least three times. The maximum win is obtained when the same figure appears on all five reels. Apart from this traditional mode, you can also play with the "Gamble" functionality. 

What is it all about?
When you obtain any winnings, the "Risk" button automatically appears, which allows you to access the special feature. A hand of cards appears on the screen and you can decide to bet all the winnings you just obtained on the color of the card that will be turned over, red or black. The chances of winning are 50:50. In case of a correct bet, the entire amount obtained will be doubled, while in the other case, the winnings will be lost. Thus, this feature is suitable for those who love to take risks and aim to obtain even more!

Conclusion:
"Fruits'n Royals" is an excellent compromise between a classic slot that recalls old land games and modern video slots. The fruity and colorful graphics gratify nostalgic players who love "old-school" slot machines, while the presence of a Wild symbol and "Gamble" functionality are typical of newer games. If you are looking for a simple and intuitive gaming experience that offers versatility and a good number of winning possibilities, then "Fruits'n Royals" is the slot machine for you!

Similar slots:
"Fruits'n Royals" is part of the category of so-called "Fruits machines", which include fruit symbols among their symbols. This is a very broad category, where you can find mostly traditional slots linked to the image of old land-based games. Despite being so traditional, it does not mean that they are out of fashion, and in fact, the offer of this type of slot is still very wide. Among the many, we find, for example, "Fruits of Ra", a successful combination of a traditional fruit machine and slots linked to historical themes, referencing ancient Egypt as its symbolism. We also have "Retro Reels", where the modernity of a video slot and the nostalgia for land-based gaming rooms are smartly combined.

faq.question: What is the Wild symbol in Fruits'n Royals?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol in Fruits'n Royals is represented by a star and can be used to replace any other symbol in completing a winning line.

faq.question: Is there a Scatter symbol in Fruits'n Royals?
faq.answer: No, there is no Scatter symbol in Fruits'n Royals.

faq.question: What is the maximum win in Fruits'n Royals?
faq.answer: The maximum win in Fruits'n Royals is obtained when the same figure appears on all five reels.

faq.question: What is the Gamble functionality in Fruits'n Royals?
faq.answer: The Gamble functionality in Fruits'n Royals allows you to bet all your winnings on the color of a card that will be turned over. If you guess the right color, your winnings will be doubled.

faq.question: What is the category of Fruits'n Royals?
faq.answer: Fruits'n Royals is part of the category of "Fruits machines", which include fruit symbols among their symbols.

faq.question: What are some similar slots to Fruits'n Royals?
faq.answer: Some similar slots to Fruits'n Royals are: Fruits of Ra, Retro Reels.

Below is a review of the game "Fruits´n Royals".

Review: "Fruits'n Royals" Slot Review

General Features:
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 10
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €20
Autoplay: No

Theme and Symbols:
At first glance, "Fruits'n Royals" may seem like a typical fruit-themed slot with a linear gameplay and no special features or effects. However, it has a beautifully crafted graphics and additional symbols, apart from the fruits. The characteristic symbols are plum, mandarin, lemon and cherries, as well as the king and queen. There is no Scatter symbol, but there is a Wild symbol represented by a star, which acts as a joker and can replace all other symbols in completing a single winning line.

Gameplay:
The gameplay of this slot machine is very simple, yet it presents special features that make the game more engaging. The objective of the game is to align the same symbol, from left to right, at least three times. The maximum win is obtained when the same figure appears on all five reels. Apart from this traditional mode, you can also play with the "Gamble" functionality. 

What is it all about?
When you obtain any winnings, the "Risk" button automatically appears, which allows you to access the special feature. A hand of cards appears on the screen and you can decide to bet all the winnings you just obtained on the color of the card that will be turned over, red or black. The chances of winning are 50:50. In case of a correct bet, the entire amount obtained will be doubled, while in the other case, the winnings will be lost. Thus, this feature is suitable for those who love to take risks and aim to obtain even more!

Conclusion:
"Fruits'n Royals" is an excellent compromise between a classic slot that recalls old land games and modern video slots. The fruity and colorful graphics gratify nostalgic players who love "old-school" slot machines, while the presence of a Wild symbol and "Gamble" functionality are typical of newer games. If you are looking for a simple and intuitive gaming experience that offers versatility and a good number of winning possibilities, then "Fruits'n Royals" is the slot machine for you!

Similar slots:
"Fruits'n Royals" is part of the category of so-called "Fruits machines", which include fruit symbols among their symbols. This is a very broad category, where you can find mostly traditional slots linked to the image of old land-based games. Despite being so traditional, it does not mean that they are out of fashion, and in fact, the offer of this type of slot is still very wide. Among the many, we find, for example, "Fruits of Ra", a successful combination of a traditional fruit machine and slots linked to historical themes, referencing ancient Egypt as its symbolism. We also have "Retro Reels", where the modernity of a video slot and the nostalgia for land-based gaming rooms are smartly combined.

dalle-prompt.response: Create a feature image fitting the game "Fruits'n Royals" with a happy Maya warrior with glasses in a cartoon style! The image should be bright and colorful with the Maya warrior smiling and surrounded by fruits and royal symbols. The background could be a castle or a palace to enhance the game's regal theme. The Maya warrior should be holding a winning combination of symbols or holding up a star - the game's Wild symbol. The image should give players a sense of excitement and fun as they play this classic-style yet modern slot machine.
